LevelSystem.descDataCarrierEmbed: Click the button below to open the data carrier. Be fast before a other user takes it or it disappears!

businessCommand.descMainEmbed: Congratulations! You are now the CEO of your own company named {{businessName}}. We hope that you will be successful.If you need help, you can contact your lawyer with /business help

businessAssistantCommand.descMainEmbed: Hello Boss! I am your assistant. Great to see you again.!I am here to help you with your business. Choose one of the options below to manage your business.{{randomString}}
businessAssistantCommand.descStaffListEmbed: Boss, here is a list of all staff members! Switch the staff member with the buttons below. If you want to level up a staff member or fire them, use the buttons below too.
businessAssistantCommand.descNewStaffEmbed: Boss, here is a list of all robots which you can hire! Switch the applicant witch the buttons below. If you want to hire a robot, use the buttons below too.
businessAssistantCommand.descBusinessStatsEmbed: Boss, here is a list of all your business stats! I hope you are happy with this stats.

businessInventoryCommand.descInventoryEmbed: Boss, here is a list of all items in your storage. To switch between the items lists use the buttons below.

embedText.footerEmbed: Nyxian.eu â€¢ Developed by julxan_ & only.sam

errorEmbeds.missPermEmbedDesc: You are missing the following permissions to execute this command: {{missingPermissions}}
